helio.framework.materialiser

Interface Evaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    H2Evaluator

    public interface Evaluator
    Evaluator allows to evaluate expressions, a composite of functions that can return a String value as result or a Boolean value (a predicate expression).
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String evaluateExpresions(java.lang.String expression)
      This method evaluates an expression that returns a String as output
      java.lang.Boolean evaluatePredicate(java.lang.String predicate)
      This method evaluates a predicate expression that returns a Boolean as output

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateExpresions

        java.lang.String evaluateExpresions(java.lang.String expression)
        This method evaluates an expression that returns a String as output
        Parameters:
        expression - A String expression
        Returns:
        The String value obtained as result of evaluating the input expression

      • evaluatePredicate

        java.lang.Boolean evaluatePredicate(java.lang.String predicate)
        This method evaluates a predicate expression that returns a Boolean as output
        Parameters:
        predicate - A Boolean predicate expression
        Returns:
        The Boolean value obtained as result of evaluating the input predicate expression
